SET(MSMOD_TARGET msmod)
SET(MSMOD_SOURCES dsarchive.c msmod.c)
SET(MSMOD_HEADERS dsarchive.h)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../libmseed)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(msmod ${MSMOD_HEADERS} ${MSMOD_SOURCES})

INSTALL(TARGETS msmod
	RUNTIME DESTINATION ${SDP_BIN_DIR}
	ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${SDP_LIB_DIR}
	LIBRARY DESTINATION ${SDP_LIB_DIR}
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${MSMOD_TARGET} mseed)
